response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item has been meticulously crafted and carries a personal significance that transcends its monetary worth. I believe it could potentially hold a similar meaning or utility for you, given your interests and needs.

I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its value while allowing you to benefit from an exclusive deal. This offer is exclusive to you and is not available to any other potential buyers at this time.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with someone who will appreciate it as much as I have.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 750000}
